page.title: 04WIGMORE LANE
page.content: Wigmore Lane gives access to an industrial area containing a cement works and petroleum storage facilities as well as 20 houses. 61 vehicles entered Wigmore Lane from the roundabout. 29 had come from the Theale by-pass, 13 from the A4(Thatcham), 9 from the A340, 2 from the A4(Theale) and 8 had gone once round the roundabout. 60 vehicles went onto the roundabout from Wigmore Lane. 18 went to the Theale by-pass, 16 to the A4(Thatcham), 10 to the A340, 8 to the A4(Theale) and 8 had gone once round the roundabout. The majority of the 113 vehicles which used Wigmore Lane were lorries belonging to the cement works. Over two-thirds of the vehicles had come from and/or went onto the main roads of the A4(Thatcham) and the Theale by-pass.
